title: Lavender Extra Essential Oil
description: Our Lavender Extra Essential Oil (lavandula angustifolia) is extremely versatile & is considered a universal oil. It safe for all skin types & is non-toxic.
cleaned_text: One of the most versatile of all essential oils, in fact it is considered the universal oil. Non-toxic, non-irritating, it is safe for all skin types and has a nearly endless list of uses and benefits. Many cultures have long employed Lavender oil in folk remedies praising its powerful healing, purifying, and soothing properties. This particular Lavender is grown high in the mountains, giving it higher linalool content. Linalool is known as the "skin's friend," so the higher the linalool content the more desirable the oil is for skin.
